name: An exquisite platinum ring with rubies
data: It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
